facet_1.name: Primeval Power
facet_1.effects: Grants Treant bonus base attack damage per hero level.

facet_2.name: Sapling
facet_2.effects: Leech Seed can be ground targeted, planting a tree that heals allies and damages all enemy units within the radius. If the tree is cut down, it regrows on the next ability interval.

effects: Grants the Eyes In The Forest ability
Treant enchants a tree, which grants him unobstructed vision in that location
The presence of the protector himself globally causes all trees to respawn faster under certain conditions
Treant become invisible near trees and root enemies upon breaking invisible
The on-attack root applies a longer root duration if the attack was made near a tree
Additionally deals damage over time corresponding to Treant's base attack damage value

abilities.name: Nature's Guise
abilities.description: Grants Treant a tree-walking buff whenever he hasn't taken damage for a period of time. Nearby trees and Nature's Grasp grants Treant bonus movement speed.
abilities.details: Player-based damage instance regardless of factions disables the ability for a fixed duration. Can be reset with cooldown reset sources.

abilities.name: Primeval Power
abilities.description: Grants Treant bonus base attack damage per hero level.
abilities.details: This ability levels up with Treant Protector.

abilities.name: Hero Model
abilities.description: Treant's hero model has the following hidden innate abilities. He may only perform or utilize the ability's functions upon a successful channeling, excluding passive innate abilities.
abilities.details: The presence of the protector himself globally causes all trees to respawn faster under certain conditions.

ability_1.name: Nature's Grasp
ability_1.details: Creates vines towards the target location. Vines slow down and deal damage to enemies that walk through.
ability_1.description: Creates vines towards the target location. Vines slow down and deal damage to enemies that walk through.
technical_details: Damage per Second: 30/40/50/60 (55/65/75/85 with Primeval Power)
interaction_notes: Nature's Guise considers the created vines as trees
Nature's Grasp is less effective on creeps

ability_2.name: Leech Seed
ability_2.details: Plants a life-sapping seed in an enemy unit, draining its health, while simultaneously slowing it.
ability_2.description: Plants a life-sapping seed in an enemy unit, draining its health, while simultaneously slowing it.

facet_effects.sapling: Leech Seed can be ground targeted, planting a tree that heals allies and damages all enemy units within the radius

technical_details: Ally Heal per Pulse: 15/30/45/60 (60/75/90/105 with Sapling)
interaction_notes: The planted seed heals friendly units around the target
The heal component is less effective on creeps

ability_3.name: Living Armor
ability_3.details: Infuses an allied hero with a protective coating which heals and grants bonus armor.
ability_3.description: Infuses an allied hero with a protective coating which heals and grants bonus armor.
interaction_notes: All ability effects can be applied on buildings
The ground-targeted ability cast attempts and prioritizes buildings
Living Armor is now an area-targeted ability with talent upgrade

ability_4.name: Eyes In The Forest
ability_4.details: Treant enchants a tree, which grants him unobstructed vision in that location.
ability_4.description: Treant enchants a tree, which grants him unobstructed vision in that location.
interaction_notes: When Overgrowth is cast, units within the radius of an enchanted tree will be entangled and damaged
Requires Aghanim's Scepter to unlock this ability

ability_5.name: Overgrowth
ability_5.details: Summons an overgrowth of vines and branches around Treant that prevent afflicted enemy units from moving, blinking, going invisible, or attacking.
ability_5.description: Summons an overgrowth of vines and branches around Treant that prevent afflicted enemy units from moving, blinking, going invisible, or attacking.
interaction_notes: Issues an offensive stop command upon debuff application
Applies Disarm, Root, and True Sight effects
With Aghanim's Scepter, also affects enemy units within radius of enchanted trees

changes: Reduced Nature's Guise downtime from 3 to 2.75
Increased Living Armor duration from 15/20/25/30 to 18/22/26/30
Living Armor: Increased heal per second from 2/3/4/5 to 3/4/5/6
Living Armor: Reduced mana cost from 55 from each level to 40/45/50/55
Aghanim's Shard upgrade: Nature's Guise no longer applies the fade delay component while attacking an enemy unit
Talents: LVL 10 -4s Nature's Grasp cooldown â†’ +2.5% Nature's Guise movement speed
Increased Primeval Power base attack damage bonus per level from 5 to 6
